headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  LANDAU, EVA J

snippet: LANDAU--Eva J. Feb. 18, 1982. Who found well deserved rest and peace 34 years ago today. Your loving son, Robert 1/3
lead_paragraph: LANDAU--Eva J. Feb. 18, 1982. Who found well deserved rest and peace 34 years ago today. Your loving son, Robert 1/3
